duties_responsibilities.duty: Elevating selling motions to focus on business outcomes and cross-architecture opportunities.
Identifying potential large opportunities outside of the current fiscal quarter.
Driving customer actions around consumption models and early deployment of new solutions.
Orchestrating and deploying the extended team to deliver vertical and/or architectural solutions.
Engaging as a player-coach with aligned account teams.
Developing relationships within and outside of IT, influencing LOB and CXO buying decisions.
Measuring and reporting on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
